1483830.name: Cyberpunk Fighter
1483830.description:
Cyberpunk Fighter is a third-person action game in a futuristic, cyberpunk world with super fighting genre. Be a hero and start your journey from saving your classmates in the school to saving people in the future from droids and robots. Prepare to dive into the most epic fights you’ve ever seen in this beat 'em up fighting game!

Key features:
- "Cyberpunk" style made in Unreal
- Running on walls skill
- Incredible fighting skills and scenes
- Super combo attacks
- Great fights with "big-boss"
- And more...

Cyberpunk Fighter - Start your journey and save the world!
1483830.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
